name: Payback Lite
description:
Get a taste of Payback (the critically acclaimed GTA-style game for the iPhone/iPod Touch) with this Lite version.

LITE VERSION FEATURES:
+ The first chapter from the full game
+ Fully 3D environment and vehicles
+ Stunning HDR lighting
+ Selected music tracks from the complete game
+ Full speech for all missions
+ Varied, visceral weaponry
+ Automatic save system - exit at any time, never lose your progress

FULL VERSION FEATURES:
+ 11 huge 3D environments - explore city streets, ice-covered lakes, parks, desert badlands and many more varied locations
+ Vastly expanded story mode, including stealth missions, prison breaks, kidnappings, races and much more
+ Extra game modes - challenge and rampage (which include randomly generated missions so you'll never run out!)
+ Full soundtrack (both speech and music) - fifteen great music tracks from signed and unsigned bands and musicians. That's five times more than the lite version!
+ Many new and exciting vehicles - including helicopters, boats, rocket cars and even exploding remote controlled cars!
+ Loads of exciting, powerful new weapons - flamethrowers, bazookas, remote-detonated bombs and more
+ Get stats on your progress - everything from distance walked to cars stolen to people killed
+ Multiple profiles so your friends can play without affecting your progress

"This is one of the most addicting games in the Apple Store today, get it!" - The Boston Globe

"Payback could well be the best Grand Theft Auto clone you've never heard of. ...there's absolutely no reason not to get in on this superbly crafted videogame" - 91%, GamesTM

"Payback is, without a doubt, the most comprehensive gaming experience the App Store has to offer." - TouchMyApps.com

"Moving through the game’s various cities, tossing grenades at oncoming vehicles and pedestrians, car jack ing fast rides, and gunning down rival gangs makes for rather engrossing gameplay." - TouchArcade.com

"The soundtrack, the graphics, the voices were all amazing ... If you have an iPhone and like the classic style view of GTA, pick up the game!" - Grand Theft Auto 4 HQ

"This is truly a killer app for the iPhone." - theportablegamer.com
